name: Bit Smasher
description:
This is Bit Smasher, a game made by a team of 3 (and a half) people, joined together by their love of retro and arcade games!

Use the punch button to send your enemies in the air, and immediately follow up with the swing of your trusty bat to send them flying! Reclaim the arcade tokens that the alien and zombie invaders took from your wallet!

Made for the  ScoreSpace x Polycade Jam in 72 hours

Created by:  Purple, PixelTitan, JuKayVid, Emilia
